amendment.description: Amendment prevents the DOD from spending funds to implement the ban on open transgender service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to prevent DOD from spending funds to implement ban on open transgender service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A097) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 183 (Roll no. 344).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A097) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 183 (Roll no. 344).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A097) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
